## Return Value

A new network device configuration object.

## Discussion

After creating the object, assign appropriate values to the inherited [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZNetworkDeviceConfiguration/attachment] and [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZNetworkDeviceConfiguration/macAddress] properties to complete the configuration object.

# init()

**Initializer**

Creates a network device configuration object for you to configure.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Return Value

A new network device configuration object.

## Discussion

After creating the object, assign appropriate values to the inherited [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZNetworkDeviceConfiguration/attachment] and [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZNetworkDeviceConfiguration/macAddress] properties to complete the configuration object.
title: init()
